title: What are some examples of allopathic medicine?
description: Answer (1 of 4): The term "allopathic medicine" is used in the West as an insult term for evidence based medicine (as opposed to alternative medicine which is that which has been shown not to work or has not been shown to work). It's also used more widely in the East as a term for Western medicin...
